tool_description: Restful API to query aluminium prices since 2014.
name: AlumPrice
title: AlumPrice

api_list.name: Base
api_list.description: Base endpoint for all GET requests

api_list.name: Paginate
api_list.description: Url used to filter data by page.

api_list.name: Id
api_list.description: Url used to filter data by Id.

api_list.name: Filter
api_list.description: This url is used to filter data by date.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://alumprice.p.rapidapi.com/tcIrrO/aluminium_api?Date=value"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "alumprice.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://alumprice.p.rapidapi.com/tcIrrO/aluminium_api?Date=value"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "alumprice.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
